item.title: An Invitation
item.author: genevieve@grand_archive.abs (Genevieve Cayley)
item.description: It seems I've been invited to Lord Kiordan's Grand Masquerade, for mysterious and of course undisclosed reasons. I was briefly tempted to refuse, but this is hardly an opportunity one can pass up. And besides, it has been a long time since I last passed through Geb. Too long, perhaps.
item.content:encoded: It seems I've been invited to Lord Kiordan's Grand Masquerade, for mysterious and of course undisclosed reasons. I was briefly tempted to refuse, but this is hardly an opportunity one can pass up. And besides, it has been a long time since I last passed through Geb. Too long, perhaps.

item.author: genevieve@grand_archive.abs (Genevieve Cayley)
item.description: Genevieve Cayley Biography Traveled the world extensively as a scholar, developed a fascination with mental/psionic magic Settled down in Absalom as an enigmatic academic Wound up working with the Grand Archive, trained in being a psychic Her recent work - some fairly technical but still fascinating research on mental hardening - methods to secure the mind against control and possession Appearance Height: 3'6, tall for a gnome but short for everything else Eyes: Piercing electric blue Hair: Pixie cut, color changes every day but it’s usually something vibrant and noticeable Hands casting somatic message as a stim Eyes always staring intently at a target as if boring a hole in them Very rarely blinks
item.content:encoded:
Genevieve Cayley

Biography

  • Traveled the world extensively as a scholar, developed a fascination with mental/psionic magic
  • Settled down in Absalom as an enigmatic academic
  • Wound up working with the Grand Archive, trained in being a psychic
  • Her recent work - some fairly technical but still fascinating research on mental hardening - methods to secure the mind against control and possession

Appearance

  • Height: 3'6, tall for a gnome but short for everything else
  • Eyes: Piercing electric blue
  • Hair: Pixie cut, color changes every day but it’s usually something vibrant and noticeable
  • Hands casting somatic message as a stim
  • Eyes always staring intently at a target as if boring a hole in them
  • Very rarely blinks
